title: Converted by Love
description: The book is about two teens from different countries who miraculously met while on the internet. The boy is from Christian background living in Canada and the girl is from Muslim background living in Iran. They continued to communicate on the internet through high school and college and after graduation from college the boy flew to Iran to meet her in person. This he did and converted her to Christianity by using methods which makes this book a must read.
author: Anthony Marsman Brown
